author: cnbc.com
title: Quorum Health Corporation Completes Sale of Hospital in Illinois
text:
BRENTWOOD, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Quorum Health Corporation (NYSE: QHC) announced today that affiliates of the Company completed the transaction for the divestiture of the 70-bed Vista Medical Center West in Waukegan, Illinois and its associated assets, to a subsidiary of US HealthVest, LLC. The transaction was effective as of 12:00:01 AM Central Standard Time on March 1, 2018. All net proceeds will be used to pay down the Term Loan Facility.
About Quorum Health Corporation
Quorum Health Corporation is an operator of general acute care hospitals and outpatient services in the United States. Through its subsidiaries, the Company owns, leases or operates a diversified portfolio of 29 affiliated hospitals with an aggregate of approximately 2,750 licensed beds. The Company also operates Quorum Health Resources, LLC, a leading hospital management advisory and consulting services business. More information about Quorum Health Corporation can be found at www.quorumhealth.com .
